:root { --accent: $(keycolor); --d0e6a5: #d0e6a5; --ffdd95: #ffdd95; --fc887b: #fc887b; --ccabda: #ccabda; --abccd8: #abccd8; --d8b2ab: #d8b2ab; --86e3ce: #86e3ce; --forum: 'a1' 'a2' 'a3' 'a4'; --rel: 'a1' 'a2' 'a3'; } @media (min-width: 640px) { ... } @media (min-width: 768px) {:root { --gta-s: 'h h h''n m .''f f f'; --forum: 'a1 a2' 'a1 a4' 'a1 a3'; --rel: 'a1 a3' 'a2 a3'; }} @media (min-width: 1024px) {:root { --str: 'a4 a4' 'a5 a5' 'a6 a6'; }} @media (min-width: 1280px) { ... } @media (min-width: 1400px) {:root { --str: 'a4 a4' 'a6 a5'; }} @media (min-width: 1536px) { ... } body { position: relative; font-family: Poppins,sans-serif; font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.5; color: #222; margin: 0 auto; overflow-x: hidden; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased !important; -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale !important; }
/* Data BG */ [data-name="TV"]{color:$(tv);} [data-name="Movie"]{color:$(movie);} [data-name="OVA"]{color:$(ova);} [data-name="ONA"]{color:$(ona);} [data-name="Special"]{color:$(special);} [data-name="Streaming"]{color:$(streaming);} [data-name="Completed"]{color:#90ee90;} [data-name="Cancelled"],[data-name="Dropped"]{color:#ff0800;} [data-name="Ongoing"]{color:#1da2d8;} [data-bg="Ongoing"]{background-color:#166534;} [data-bg="Completed"]{background-color:#6b21a8;} [data-bg="Dropped"]{background-color:#ef4444;} [data-bg="Movie"]{background-color:mediumaquamarine} [data-bg="OVA"]{background-color:yellowgreen} [data-bg="ONA"]{background-color:#bef264} [data-bg="TV"]{background-color:yellow} [data-bg="Score"]{background-color:gold} [data-bg="Donghua"]{background-color:#fca5a5}
li.content::before {content: '';}
/* Grid */ .psd [data-episode-player-container=""] {display: grid} .gta-q { grid-template-areas: 'a1 a1' 'a3 a3'; } .gta-s { grid-template-areas: var(--rel); grid-template-rows: auto 1fr; } .gta-r { grid-template-areas: 'a1 a1' 'a2 a2'; grid-template-rows: auto 1fr; } .gta-str { grid-template-areas: var(--str); grid-template-columns: 300px 1fr; } .gta-info { grid-template-areas:'a1 a3' 'a2 a3';} .gta-forum { grid-template-areas:var(--forum);}
/* SVG Color */ .psd #playSidebar {color: var(--accent);} /* Data Hidden */ [data-separator="hidden"] :is(.separator, #synopsis), .not\[Ep\] :not([data*="Ep"], [data*="Raw"], [data*="Preview"]), #section h3.title, .warningOff #KFkMh1HX1o {display: none;} #popup-modal #synopsis {display: block}
#singlepisode{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1);overflow:hidden;margin-bottom:15px;box-shadow:1px 3px 8px rgba(49,49,49,.1)}#singlepisode img{max-width:100%;height:auto}#singlepisode .headlist{overflow:hidden;padding:15px;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,.1)}#singlepisode .headlist .thumb{float:left;overflow:hidden;width:60px;height:60px;border-radius:50%;border:2px solid #333;margin-right:10px}#singlepisode .headlist .det{overflow:hidden;color:#fff;padding-top:9px}#singlepisode .headlist .det h3{margin:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-bottom:5px;font-size:14px;font-weight:500;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:2}#singlepisode .headlist .det span{font-size:13px;color:#aaa}#singlepisode .headlist .det span i{color:#eda400}#singlepisode .episodelist{position:relative}#singlepisode .episodelist ul{overflow:scroll;list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0;max-height:350px}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li{overflow:hidden;position:relative}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li.selected,#singlepisode .episodelist ul li:hover{background-color:#00000033}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li a{display:block;padding:10px;overflow:hidden}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .thumbnel{float:left;width:100px;height:60px;overflow:hidden;position:relative;margin-right:10px}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .thumbnel img{width:100%;min-height:60px}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .thumbnel .nowplay{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;line-height:60px;color:rgba(255,255,255,.68);text-align:center;font-size:30px;background:rgba(0,0,0,.8)}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .thumbnel .nowplay .far{line-height:60px}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .playinfo{overflow:hidden;padding-top:5px}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .playinfo h4{margin:0;margin-bottom:0;margin-bottom:5px;font-weight:500;font-size:14px;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:2}#singlepisode .episodelist ul li .playinfo span{font-size:12px;}
/* Post Streaming Custom CSS */ a.active svg {display: block} #list-episode a.active{color:var(--accent);} #pembed iframe{width:100%;height:100%;} .npep{color:#333;} .npep[href]{color:white;} #shadow{display:none;background-color:black;position:fixed;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:29;} #shadow.active{display:block;} #pembed{position:relative;z-index:30;} .ssl.active::before {width: 4px}
/* Widget Styling */ .widget h2.title {color:#262626;font-weight:600;font-size: 1.25rem;line-height: 1.75rem;margin-bottom: 1.25rem;} .dark .widget h2.title {color:var(--accent)} .widget .widget-content {padding: 1rem;border-radius: 0.25rem;--tw-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1), 0 1px 2px -1px rgb(0 0 0 / 0.1);--tw-shadow-colored: 0 1px 3px 0 var(--tw-shadow-color), 0 1px 2px -1px var(--tw-shadow-color);box-shadow: var(--tw-ring-offset-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-ring-shadow, 0 0 #0000), var(--tw-shadow);} .widget .widget-content {background-color: white} .dark .widget .widget-content {background-color: #262626;} #section .widget-content {border-radius: 0;box-shadow: none}
/* Rank */ [data="border-r1"] {--tw-border-opacity: 1;border-right-color: rgb(132 204 22 / var(--tw-bg-opacity))} [data="border-r2"] {--tw-border-opacity: 1;border-right-color: rgb(190 81 103 / var(--tw-border-opacity))} [data="border-r3"] {--tw-border-opacity: 1;border-right-color: rgb(247 191 99 / var(--tw-border-opacity))} [data="rank-1"] {color: rgb(132 204 22 / var(--tw-bg-opacity))} [data="rank-2"] {color: rgb(190 81 103 / var(--tw-border-opacity))} [data="rank-3"] {color: rgb(247 191 99 / var(--tw-border-opacity))}
/* List Label Multicolor */ .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+1) a{color: var(--d0e6a5)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+2) a{color: var(--ffdd95)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+3) a{color: var(--fc887b)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+4) a{color: var(--ccabda)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+5) a{color: var(--abccd8)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+6) a{color: var(--d8b2ab)} .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n) a{color: var(--86e3ce)}
.cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+1) a{background-color: var(--d0e6a5)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+2) a{background-color: var(--ffdd95)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+3) a{background-color: var(--fc887b)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+4) a{background-color: var(--ccabda)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+5) a{background-color: var(--abccd8)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n+6) a{background-color: var(--d8b2ab)} .cloud-label-widget-content span:nth-of-type(7n) a{background-color: var(--86e3ce)}
/* Episode */ .not\[Ep\] [data*="Ep"]::before {content: '';background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg xmlns="http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 24 24"%3E%3Cpath fill="%23111" d="M18 11h-1.5v-.5h-2v3h2V13H18v1a1 1 0 0 1-1 1h-3a1 1 0 0 1-1-1v-4a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3a1 1 0 0 1 1 1m-7 1H9.5v-.5h-2v3h2V13H11v1a1 1 0 0 1-1 1H7a1 1 0 0 1-1-1v-4a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3a1 1 0 0 1 1 1m8-6H5c-1.11 0-2 .89-2 2v12a2 2 0 0 0 2 2h14a2 2 0 0 0 2-2V6a2 2 0 0 0-2-2Z"%2F%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E'); width: 20px;height: 20px;display: block;margin-inline-end: 3px;}
/* Popular Post border bottom color */ [data-border="1"],[data-border="2"],[data-border="3"] {border-bottom-color: var(--accent);} .nth-3u:nth-child(n+4) .u3 {color: gray;border-bottom: 0;}
/* Custom Color */ .bg-r06 {background: rgba(78,78,82,.6);} .star {color: #ffc107}
/* Mobile APP */ .app #header {height: 60px} .app #sidebar {grid-row-start: 1;} .app .widget .widget-content {background-color: transparent} .app .widget h2.title {display: none} .app .widget,.app #sidebar-home {overflow: hidden} .app #sidebar .widget ul.grid-cols-3 {grid-template-columns: auto;display: flex;overflow-x: scroll;gap: 1rem;scroll-snap-type: x mandatory;} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li {flex-shrink: 0;scroll-snap-align: start;} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li a {border-radius: 20px;padding-top: .2rem;padding-bottom: .2rem;} .app .M1uq {padding-left: 7px;padding-right: 7px;background-color: white;color: #262626}
/* App List Label Multicolor */ .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+1) a{border: 1px solid var(--d0e6a5)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+2) a{border: 1px solid var(--ffdd95)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+3) a{border: 1px solid var(--fc887b)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+4) a{border: 1px solid var(--ccabda)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+5) a{border: 1px solid var(--abccd8)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n+6) a{border: 1px solid var(--d8b2ab)} .app .list-label-widget-content ul li:nth-of-type(7n) a{border: 1px solid var(--86e3ce)}
/* Data List */ .dark #extra-info {color: #a3a3a3} #extra-info dt {font-weight: 600;display: inline;} #extra-info > span {display: flex;gap: 10px;}
/* Grid Area */ .a1 {grid-area: a1;} .a2 {grid-area: a2;} .a3 {grid-area: a3;} .a4 {grid-area: a4;} .a5 {grid-area: a5;} .a6 {grid-area: a6;}
/* Scrollbar Reset */ ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:0} ::-webkit-scrollbar:hover{width:10px} ::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#f1f1f1} ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:#888} ::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover{background:#555} ::-webkit-scrollbar{width:10px} .dark ::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:#171717}
/* Hide scrollbar for Chrome, Safari and Opera */ .overflow-y-scroll::-webkit-scrollbar {display: none;}
/* Hide scrollbar for IE, Edge and Firefox */ .overflow-y-scroll {-ms-overflow-style: none; scrollbar-width: none;}
/* Not Safe for Work */ .nsfw img {filter: blur(12px) saturate(1.1) brightness(90%);} .sfw .nsfw img {filter: none} .sfw .nsfw-mode .off,.nsfw-mode .on {display: none} .sfw .nsfw-mode .on {display: inline-block} .toggle-lang{display:inline-block;cursor:pointer;overflow:hidden;height:18px;border-radius:3px;background:#4d5059!important;margin-bottom:2px;} .toggle-lang > span{font-size:12px;font-weight:500;line-height:18px;width:26px;text-align:center;display:block;float:left;} .toggle-lang.x > span.jp{background:var(--accent);color:#111;} .sfw .toggle-lang.x > span.en{background:var(--accent);color:#111;} .sfw .toggle-lang.x > span.jp{background:0 0;color:#fff;}
/* Actor */ .viewmore [data-modal-target="modalcharacters"]{color:#737373;} .block-actors-content{display:flex;gap:1rem;flex-wrap:wrap;font-size:0.75rem;} .bac-item{width:calc(33.33% - 1rem);border-radius:6px;overflow:hidden;background-color:white;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;padding:.6rem;flex-grow:1;} .dark .bac-item{background-color:#262626;} .per-info{position:relative;display:flex;gap:.5rem;} .per-info .pi-avatar{width:45px;height:45px;border-radius:50%;overflow:hidden;flex-shrink:0;} .per-info.rtl img{opacity:.7;filter:grayscale(1);} .pi-avatar:hover img{opacity:1!important;filter:none!important;} .per-info.rtl{flex-direction:row-reverse;} .per-info.rtl .pi-detail{text-align:end;} .pi-avatar img{object-fit:cover;width:100%;height:100%;}
/* Badges */ [data-author] .userBanner::after, .adminBanner::after, [data-author] .userBanner2::after, [data-author] .userBanner3::after, [data-author] .userBanner4 ::after{padding:1px 6px;display:flex;font-weight:600;border-radius:2px;border:1px solid transparent;font-size:80%;margin-top:3px;color:#fff;justify-content:center;font-size:75%;} .adminBanner::after{content:"Admin";background:#9b59b6;border-color:#b07cc6;} .username-admin {color: #9b59b6 !important} [data-author*="09171272848542294839"] .userBanner::after {content: "Staff";background: #e91e63;border-color: #ee4c83;} [data-author*="09171272848542294839"] .userBanner2::after {content: "Group Leader";background: #3498db;border-color: #5faee3;}
/* Seasons */ .os-list{display:block;margin:0 -5px;overflow:hidden;} .os-list .os-item{width:calc(16.66% - 10px);height:60px;margin:5px;overflow:hidden;float:left;text-align:center;background-color:rgba(255,255,255,.1);border-radius:.5rem;display:block;position:relative;} .os-list .os-item .title{font-size:12px;font-weight:600;position:absolute;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);width:100%;padding:0 10px;z-index:3;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-line-clamp:2;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;overflow:hidden;} .os-list .os-item .season-poster{position:absolute;z-index:1;left:-10px;right:-10px;bottom:-10px;top:-10px;background-position:center center;background-size:cover;filter:blur(3px);opacity:.3;} .os-list .os-item:before{content:"";position:absolute;z-index:2;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;background:url(https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEjndjW0WqOlNsi56gPPdsjuouIOjgSpRwObZfndoJcQh8i0DIjeQhqEco6ju_FREjXR5gxkSzxDmQ-n1tUN6hBHtXBThCgLxiK23NRlRljCUhWaLOElr0uQZQUv9x0ys8ayi9Fh0Lj_pT_73R3o9oYMwpYB9SOicMYPsGo71IsVdrgvl_eoL7vJO8NpOQ/s4/live-thumb.png) repeat;} .os-list .os-item.active{border:1px solid var(--accent);} .os-list .os-item.active .title{color:var(--accent);} @media screen and (max-width:1599px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(30% - 10px);}} @media screen and (max-width:1400px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(16.66% - 10px);}} @media screen and (max-width:860px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(16.66% - 10px)}} @media screen and (max-width:759px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(20% - 10px)}} @media screen and (max-width:575px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(33.33% - 1rem)}} @media screen and (max-width:479px){.os-list .os-item{width:calc(50% - 1rem)}}

/* Cover Image */ .deslide-cover-img::before{content:"";z-index:1;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;background:#202125;background:-moz-linear-gradient(90deg,#202125 0,rgba(32,33,37,.6) 40%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 60%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 80%,#202125 100%);background:-webkit-linear-gradient(90deg,#202125 0,rgba(32,33,37,.6) 40%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 60%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 80%,#202125 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#202125 0,rgba(32,33,37,.6) 40%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 60%,rgba(32,33,37,0) 80%,#202125 100%);} .film-poster-ahref{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;z-index:3;display:flex;} .film-poster-ahref::after{content:"";position:absolute;top:auto;right:0;left:0;bottom:0;height:100%;opacity:0;z-index:1;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.3);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(10px);} .film-poster:hover .film-poster-ahref::after{height:100%;opacity:1;} .film-poster-ahref svg{z-index:2;opacity:0;color:#fff;} .film-poster:hover .film-poster-ahref svg{opacity:1;} .film-poster-ahref::after{transition:all .2s ease 0s;}

/* Toast */ .toast{position:fixed;transform:translateX(calc(100% + 30px));transition:all 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.68,-0.55,0.265,1.35);} .toast.active{transform:translateX(0%);} .toast .progress{position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0;height:3px;width:100%;} .toast .progress:before{content:'';position:absolute;bottom:0;right:0;height:100%;width:100%;} .progress.active:before{animation:progress 5s linear forwards;} @keyframes progress{100%{right:100%;}}

/* Multi Tabs Random Post */ .customAgata .number{grid-area:n;} .customAgata .images{grid-area:i;} .customAgata .entry-title{grid-area:e;} .customAgata .rating{grid-area:r;} .tempt{grid-template-areas:'n i e''n i r';} .nav-tabs .active span {color: var(--accent);}
/* Bookmark by Igniel */ #dropdownBookmark .bmw{display:grid;grid-template-columns:50px 1fr auto;gap:1rem;padding:5px;align-items:center;} #dropdownBookmark .thm{padding-bottom:130%;position:relative;} .page .ignielBookmarks ul{display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(151px,1fr));gap:1rem;} .page .thm{position:relative;display:block;padding-bottom:130%;} .page .bmw{position:relative;} .page .bm-delete{position:absolute;top:0;background:var(--fc887b);padding:4px;border-end-start-radius:8px;inset-inline-end:0;} #ignielBookmark,.ignielBookmarkPost input{display:none;} .ignielBookmark label:hover path,.ignielBookmarkPost label:hover path{stroke:var(--bm-icon-active);} #ignielBookmark:checked ~ label svg,.ignielBookmarkPost input:checked ~ label svg{color:var(--accent);} .ignielBookmarkPost label{width:25px;height:25px;border-radius:99rem;display:grid;place-content:center;} .ignielBookmarkPost input:checked ~ label{border:1px solid var(--accent);}
/* Live Search */ .live-search-item{position:fixed;z-index:9999;background-color:var(--postBg);color:var(--postText);} .live-search-item ul{padding:0;margin:0;list-style:none;} .live-search-item li{padding:10px;border-bottom:1px solid var(--postText);overflow:hidden;} .live-search-item li a{display:block;} .live-search-thumb{margin-right:10px;float:left;width:40px;height:60px;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:0;box-sizing:content-box;text-decoration:none;} .live-search-item li img{max-width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:cover;} .live-search-item li .over{overflow:hidden;float:right;width:calc(100% - (40px + 10px));box-sizing:content-box;} .live-search-item .live-meta{display:block;color:var(--postText);margin-bottom:2px;font-size:12px;overflow:hidden;}
/* Forum */ .message-userArrow{position:absolute;top:20px;right:-17px;border:15px solid transparent;border-right-width:15px;border-right-style:solid;border-right-color:transparent;border-right:20px solid #171717;transform:rotate(-90deg);}

/* Schedule V2 */ #jadwal{--sc-cols:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(110px,1fr));--sc-clamp:3;--sc-color:#00dc64;--scar:3/4;} @media (min-width:640px){#jadwal{--sc-cols:repeat(auto-fill,minmax(160px,1fr));}} .timeline.hidden{display:none;} .timeline{display:grid;grid-template-columns:var(--sc-cols)} .item > a{aspect-ratio:var(--scar);overflow:hidden;display:block;position:relative;} .item img{width:100%;} .item time{position:absolute;background-color:var(--sc-color);top:2px;padding:2px;inset-inline-start:4px;border-radius:3px;font-size:90%;color:black;font-weight:bold;} #jadwal .na{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:.5rem;color:var(--sc-color);font-size:90%;} .info span{display:block;color:#fd337f;font-size:90%;font-weight:bold;} .info{padding:5px;} .info{overflow:hidden;display:-webkit-box;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-line-clamp:var(--sc-clamp);}
